summary:
Richard Paul Singh is the founder and Managing Director of Ricatech- the only consumer electronics company that retails retro electronics in its most sophisticated way. Richard is an entrepreneur who found an attractive niche in the overcrowded market of consumer electronics.

Born by an Indian father and Dutch mother, Richard Singh inherited both European and Indian entrepreneurial skills. The entire family in India is entrepreneurial where his father was working at Philips Holland as a engineer and was active in the leather business as well. It did not trigger Richard to step into the same type of business. He started his journey into the consumer electronics market. 

In 2005, Richard pitched his business concept, carrying his self-made suitcase containing MP3 players, to the CEO of Media Markt in Holland. This giant in consumer electronics and part of the Metro Group, largest in Europe and second largest in the world is till date a proud reseller for Ricatech electronics.

While Ricatech became the largest manufacturer in Retro electronics in Europe, Richard pushed borders and reached out to America for some very exclusive projects. There he approached the Elvis Presley Enterprises for the production of an exclusive Elvis Presley product line. Hereafter he was approached by Playboy USA to come up with special edition jukebox as a tribute to the brand and magazine founder Hugh Hefner. Richard worked almost 2 years on this project and released The Iconic Playboy Jukebox in 2016 for the first time at The Playboy Mansion, Beverly Hills USA. The most current venture is a product line for Asia’s most celebrated superstar, Amitabh Bachchan under the official license and in association with the living legend himself.

profile_positions.description:
Leading the European Retro Electronic Market for more than a decade, Ricatech is leaving no stone unturned to make a mark in retro style electronics in the Global Market. Ricatech has been creating a global buzz in the retro and vintage electronics field with its exclusive jukeboxes and projects. From manufacturing and distributing MP3 players and audio fidelity to developing such exclusive, high quality, luxury Jukeboxes, Ricatech has come a long way.

After making the very unique Elvis Presley and iconic Playboy Jukebox, Ricatech has now come up with an exclusive edition of The Amitabh Bachchan Jukebox.
This luxury jukebox is one of its kind with many special features. On developing this limited edition priced possession, Mr. Amitabh Bachchan, the Living Legend to dedicate this fabulous creation to.

For more than 13 years, Ricatech has been very active in production and distribution to retail and e-commerce partners in Europe and beyond. Ricatech is now entering the biggest emerging market in the world: India.

Across the range, we offer the best quality at surprisingly affordable prices and cooperate with many professional partners. More about the exclusive projects in partnership with Elvis Presley Enterprises, Playboy, and Amitabh Bachchan, see below.

✆   +31(0)10-4626733    
►   www.ricatech.com
✉ richard@ricatech.com
profile_positions.title: Founder

profile_positions.description:
Ricatech is always on the move. The idea of ​​the Amitabh Bachchan Jukebox started with his business partner. To reach the world star, convince and meet him at all was one of the biggest challenges.  There are millions of fans all over the world who wants to meet this celebrity. Richard personally delivered the jukebox at his office of the big B!. Amitabh Bachchan was very pleased with his special gift. This project was a hugh achievement in the carriere of Richard Singh. 

Exclusive for his 74th birthday, on the 11th of October, Ricatech gifted Amitabh Bachchan a very special jukebox. It is the number #74 from the 100 pieces that will be made worldwide. This limited edition jukebox is available for the ones that would like to own this collectors item!
In this video, Big B’s fans talk about what they would give Mr. Bachchan for his birthday and
Richard Singh tells you the story behind this amazing jukebox! Do you want to be one of the exclusive owners as well, just like Amitabh Bachchan? Contact me at richard@ricatech.com
profile_positions.title: The Amitabh Bachchan Jukebox - An Indian Venture

profile_positions.description:
Ricatech has been approached by Playboy to design and develop a special jukebox. Playboy’s salesman was inspired and impressed with the Elvis Jukebox, that was launced in 2012.  With all the ideas and technical features Richard worked one and a half year on this special design. 

Richard personally delivered the jukebox to the Playboy Mansion in Los Angeles. The jukebox is a perfect combination of luxury and pure entertainment. The 19th piece is added to the private collection of Hugh Hefner.  Ricatech is the worldwide exclusive licensee of the Playboy Juxeboxes.  This special achievement was one of the greatest adventures. 

This extremely exclusive –only 20 pieces built word wide- Iconic Playboy Jukebox is the result of a tie-up between Ricatech and global adult entertainment brand Playboy. 
Since 1953 Playboy has been a tastemaker, an arbiter of style and a vanguard for political, sexual and economic freedom for more than 62 years and one of the top 20 brands in the world.

In the video you see The Iconic Playboy Jukebox standing in front of The Playboy Mansion with Managing Director of Ricatech, Richard Singh and one of the top Playmates. Music and entertainment just don't get any more exotic than this.
profile_positions.title: The Iconic Playboy Limited Edition Jukebox - A tribute to Hugh Hefner

profile_positions.description:
All beginnings are difficult! With this Elvis project Richard started his first and biggest challenge. Ricatech worked day and night on designing, tooling and the special features. In collaboration with Elvis Presley Enterprises they can proudly present this finest jukebox. This first accomplishment was also a personal achievement for the development of next projects.

Ricatech is the worldwide exclusive licensee of the Elvis Presley Jukeboxes. This jukebox, with its dancing bubbles and rotating color cylinders reflects the free American spirit of the 50's. Now you can own a part of "American history".  More at www.richatech.com
profile_positions.title: The Legendary Elvis Presley Jukebox

profile_positions.description:
PM Mark Rutte to lead high-level Trade Mission to India
Ricatech's Richard Singh is also joining the Trade Mission to India. Mark Rutte, Prime Minister of the Netherlands and the official deligation will pay a state visit to India from 22th-25th May 2018.

While PM Rutte will be in India from 24th- 25th, a Dutch delegation comprising Officials, Companies and Institutions will be in India from 22nd-25th May. PM Rutte’s visit to India comes within a year of Indian Prime Minister, Narendra Modi’s visit to the Netherlands on 27 June, 2017.
Prime Minister Rutte will be accompanied by Ministers Sigrid Kaag (Minister for Foreign Trade and Development Cooperation), Carola Schouten (Deputy Prime Minister, Minister of Agriculture, Nature and Food Quality), Cora van Nieuwenhuizen (Minister of Infrastructure and Water Management) and Bruno Bruins (Minister for Medical Care).
profile_positions.title: Dutch Trade Mission to India
